newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: Ssangyong crude unit to close Sept 2-22.
newsitem.headline: Ssangyong crude unit to close Sept 2-22.

text.p: South Korea's Ssangyong Oil Refining Co, a unit of Ssangyong Group, said on Friday it would close down its No. 3 crude distillation unit (CDU) between September 2 and 22 for annual maintenance.
The 200,000 barrel-per-day (bpd) CDU underwent a brief checkup from May 17 to 21, a company spokesman said.
Ssangyong, the nation's second largest oil refiner in terms of capacity, has a crude oil processing capability of 443,000 bpd.
